thread.section_title: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London - West End - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Beautifully designed hotel close to Underground
thread.title_full: Beautifully designed hotel close to Underground - Review of DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London - West End, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: 834clydew
title: Beautifully designed hotel close to Underground
text: The hotel decor is beautiful, more like a boutique hotel than a chain. The breakfast, restaurant offerings, and bar service all good. Conveniently located to Underground. Rooms are smaller than what Americans are used to, but by London standards very nice.
